title: Monday Post Show (04-04-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (04-04-22)
description:
Bobby starts by talking about the Thomas Rhett iHeartCountry album release tonight and Amy on the Miranda Lambert iHeartCountry album release. We get into an argument of using Venmo and why it is or isn’t safe. Amy talks about how it’s crazy that kids don’t play outside anymore these days. This leads to a deeper discussion on life and what it takes to pursue something that’s uncomfortable and how our backgrounds can influence our drive in life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
